articles.author: Matthew Elder
articles.description: The referees and VAR officials for this weekend's Viaplay Cup semi-finals have been confirmed.
articles.title: Referees and VAR officials for Celtic and Rangers' Viaplay Cup semi-finals confirmed

articles.author: Angus Wright
articles.description: Celtic are reportedly prepared to sell Stephen Welsh in the January transfer window having turned down previous approaches the defender.
articles.title: Celtic 'willing to listen to offers' for defender as clubs in Europe and MLS circle

articles.author: Angus Wright
articles.description: Celtic may have to improve on their original offer to land South Korea striker Cho Gue-sung after reportedly being outbid by MLS outfit Minnesota United.
articles.title: Celtic and Rangers see transfer rival emerge for World Cup star as £4.2m bid made

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: Aberdeen boss Jim Goodwin has confirmed the club are continuing to “work away” on a contract extension for Connor Barron with an offer still on the table, while noting the Dons would be due a “considerable amount of compensation” if he was to leave on a free in 18 months.
articles.title: Aberdeen provide Connor Barron contract update with 'considerable compensation' admission

articles.author: Angus Wright
articles.description: Rangers have been linked with a move for Celtic target Gue-Sung Cho, the striker who starred for South Korea at the World Cup.
articles.title: Rangers linked with Celtic target and £3m World Cup star as one of 3 possible new signings

articles.author: Angus Wright
articles.description: Rangers have been linked with a move for Celtic target Gue-Sung Cho, the striker who starred for South Korea at the World Cup.
articles.title: Rangers linked with Celtic target and £3m World Cup star as one 3 possible new signings

articles.author: Mark Atkinson
articles.description: Celtic defender Josip Juranovic is likely to leave Celtic this week, with ambitious Serie A outfit Monza now the favourites for his signature.
articles.title: Celtic transfers: Monza closing in on Josip Juranovic, 'new bid' for Cho, fresh interest in Stephen Welsh

articles.author: Matthew Elder
articles.description: In a Celtic team that dominates games and plays on the front foot, it can be hard for a defender to stand out.
articles.title: Cameron Carter-Vickers admits 'cringe' over Rangers celebration and is not taking Celtic place for granted despite good form

articles.author: Ross McLeish
articles.description: Japanese outfit Urawa Red Diamonds are closing in on a deal to sign Celtic striker Giorgos Giakoumakis, according to reports.
articles.title: Giorgos Giakoumakis Celtic exit gathers pace as Urawa Red Diamonds make their move

articles.author: Andrew Smith
articles.description: Celtic’s 2-0 home win over a Kilmarnock that they will meet again in next week’s Viaplay League Cup semi-final produced some unexpected musings.
articles.title: Celtic reaction: Huge onus on duo; Jota’s linguistic marvels; Postecoglou speaks to McGarvey family and on Kevin Bridges

articles.author: Andrew Smith
articles.description: Rangers manager Michael Beale has declared Celtic counterpart Ange Postecoglou a “lucky man” over the differential between the clubs’ transfer fee spends in the past two seasons.
articles.title: Celtic boss Ange Postecoglou 'is lucky man', says Rangers manager Michael Beale as transfer budgets are discussed

articles.author: Andrew Smith
articles.description: Rangers manager Michael Beale has declared Celtic counterpart Ange Postecoglou a “lucky man” over the differential between the clubs’ transfer fee spends in the past two seasons.
articles.title: Celtic boss Ange Postecoglou 'is a lucky man', says Rangers manager Michael Beale as transfer budgets are discussed

articles.author: Andrew Smith
articles.description: Meet 2023, same as 2022 for Scottish teams pitching up to Celtic Park. They come, they defend, they suffer defeat, usually with Ange Postecoglou’s men graciously sparing them a bleaching through converting only a fraction of their chances.
articles.title: Celtic partake in a goalframe challenge as Kilmarnock fortunate to escape with 2-0 defeat

articles.author: Andrew Smith
articles.description: Kilmarnock manager Derek McInnes contends he will have to overcome the best Celtic team he has faced in his years as a coach to pull-off shock in next week’s Viaplay League Cup semi-final.
articles.title: Derek McInnes reveals where he ranks current Celtic team as Kilmarnock look to 'find an answer' ahead of semi-final

articles.author: Andrew Smith
articles.description: Celtic manager Ange Postecoglou refuses to give thought to the desirability of not allowing players to move on after being burned over that in his early trackside days.
articles.title: Ange Postecoglou refuses to 'fall in love' with his Celtic players as he addresses Giorgos Giakoumakis future

articles.author: Ross McLeish
articles.description: Monza have emerged as a surprise contender for the signature of Celtic right-back Josip Juranovic.
articles.title: Celtic transfers: Left-field 'serious' suitor for Josip Juranovic emerges, Aissa Laidouni responds to questions over move

articles.author: Matthew Elder
articles.description: Celtic have never lost a domestic fixture on home soil under Ange Postecoglou and they will look to keep that record intact when they host Kilmarnock on Saturday.
articles.title: What channel is Celtic v Kilmarnock on? Kick-off time, how to watch, referee and VAR officials

articles.author: Andrew Smith
articles.description: Rangers full-back Borna Barisic has refused to join the VAR-bashing fraternity in Scottish football.
articles.title: Rangers' Borna Barisic speaks on VAR, turning 30 and gives sheepish response on clash with Celtic captain

articles.author: Matthew Elder
articles.description: New Celtic signing Tomoki Iwata is set to be paraded at Parkhead after landing in Glasgow on Friday night.
articles.title: Tomoki Iwata's Celtic role explained, no bids for duo and why Alexandro Bernabei was overlooked at Ibrox

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: Aberdeen boss Jim Goodwin has assured fans all three loan players are set to remain at the club beyond the January transfer window.
articles.title: 'Liverpool are delighted' - Aberdeen boss Jim Goodwin gives update on loan stars including Leighton Clarkson

articles.author: Matthew Elder
articles.description: There is always plenty to digest in wake of an Old Firm derby and that was particularly the case for Celtic manager Ange Postecoglou this week after the 2-2 draw at Ibrox on Monday.
articles.title: 'It's not a perception' - Celtic boss Ange Postecoglou takes aim at VAR and slams Ibrox missile-throwers after Rangers derby

articles.author: Angus Wright
articles.description: Celtic left-back Greg Taylor faces at least two weeks out with a hamstring injury.
articles.title: Greg Taylor injury timeline revealed as Celtic left-back set for spell on sidelines

articles.author: Angus Wright
articles.description: Serie A side Monza are the latest club to be linked with a move for Celtic ace Josip Juranvoic.
articles.title: Celtic star wanted by Serie A side as Italian journalist makes 'loan with obligation to buy' claim

articles.description: Ice-hockey was Alistair Johnston’s first love but if the relationship fizzled out, the formative imprint left its mark.
